intro: Psychotria tenella, commonly known as the "Soul-leaf" or "Datura leaf," is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. The plant produces small, yellowish fruits that contain seeds, and it often grows in shaded, humid environments. Psychotria tenella is also noted for its historical use in traditional medicine and ceremonial practices.
